analysis.summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders a left-pointing chevron SVG icon with a customizable fill color.
analysis.purpose: Provides a reusable navigation icon (left chevron) for UI elements across the application.

components.name: IconChevronLeft
components.responsibility: Renders an SVG chevron-left shape and accepts a `fill` prop to control its color.

notes: No `<style>` block – styling is driven entirely by the SVG and the `fill` prop.
Default `fill` prop uses a CSS variable (`rgb(var(--black)`) but is missing a closing parenthesis; this may be a typo or requires validation in global styles.
No methods, computed properties or watchers – purely presentational.
